Grid Auto Columns

# Grid Auto Columns

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                  | Support     |
| ---------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
auto-cols-auto
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
auto-cols-min
```  | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
auto-cols-max
```  | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
auto-cols-fr
```   | 🌐 Web only |
